verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Waheana na kameni
ukagairwo o nako,
Mwathani moe ii nomarathime.
Waheana na giitirira
muigana na ucio,
Mwathani moe ii nomarathime.
Warega gukiheana no
anga ugakiiguirwo tha,
Mwathani moe ii nomarathime.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Twarehe matega mbere
yaku we mwathani,
nithithino ya migunda itu,
turagutegera.
Mwathani moe ii nomarathime,
Mwathani moe ii nomarathime.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Maahinya ma miiri itu
monete o tuhu uyu,
Mwathani moe ii nomarathime.
Korwo ndi hinya muiganu
ingigutegera ki,
Mwathani moe ii nomarathime.
Ingienda gugutegera
uigana hinya ucio,
Mwathani moe ii nomarathime.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ngoro nyanduku na utana
we tahe Mwathani,
Mwathani moe ii nomarathime.
Ngoro nyanduku na uthuci
we tanjeheraria,
Mwathani moe ii nomarathime...
(continues...)

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Niamu ndiri giakwa
tiga kiria we uhete,
Mwathani moe ii nomarathime.
Nganja hatiri gutega
nigugucokeria guoko,
Mwathani moe ii nomarathime.
